speaker: Luis Cabrera
title: Knowledge Mining with Azure Search
description:
Luis Cabrera and Seth Juarez discuss the Cognitive Search capabilities, and how a user can extract structure from unstructured information. They will demo how easy it is use a new capability called Cognitive Search to enrich your search index.

Main Demo: 04:56
